characters.story: "Pay me back!" he questioned, compensating with shellfish after standing trial.
"Pay attention to how it grows!" she questioned, cultivating soil as she stood.
The sun takes the shape of sound, singing "Yin!" cheerfully!
The sun takes the shape of dark, shouting "An!" sharply as sunlight streams across the sky!
Picture rhyme taking form - it shouts "Yun!" with vivid energy!
This character represents knowledge, shouting "Shi!" sharply!
This character represents streamer, shouting "Zhi!" sharply!
The strokes unite to show unexpectedly, shouting "Jing!" sharply!
Like gold, this character means mirror and shouts "Jing!" - a vivid image to remember!
A boundary earth unexpectedly yells "Jing!" sharply bordering!
See how the person forms deceased? It asks "Wang? Where died?" curiously!
The eye takes the shape of blind, asking "Mang? Can't see?" curiously!
This character represents absurd, shouting "Wang!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The moon takes the shape of to expect, shouting "Wang!" sharply!
This character represents direction, singing "Fang!" cheerfully!
"Fang, are you blocking?" The woman questioned which direction, hindering progress.
"Fang!" Strike to release! He freed the direction sharply.
The white and water unite to create to excite, singing "Ji!" cheerfully!
"Yoo, where is it located?" they questioned the place and direction.
Picture side taking form - it asks "Pang? Which side?" with vivid energy!
"Dway!" The person's mouth commanded sharply, converting and exchanging currency.
"Twoh!" she sang cheerfully, removing her flesh-colored clothes to undress.
"Shwoh!" The words talked and spoke cheerfully, converting ideas.
Picture formerly taking form - it asks "Tseng? Long ago?" with vivid energy!
"Zeng!" The earth grew cheerfully, increasing from what it was formerly.
The shellfish stands for to make a present of, shouting "Zeng!" sharply!
The tree stands for east, singing "Dong!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
The tree stands for building, shouting "Dong!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
Picture to freeze taking form - it shouts "Dong!" with vivid energy!
